A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Second only to Empire. 
Kylo accomplishes something Vader was never able to do\, yet he is still in Vader's shadow. And he will spend the rest of his life trying to get out of it. 
I love how it shows Luke's humanity. The moral dilemma: do I kill my nephew and answer to my sister and brother in law? Or do I let him live and live with what he becomes? 
The slow chase was really well done. The suspense was real and Poe's determination to do whatever possible to save the Resistance\, even half baked plans\, showed how desperate the situation was.
